comments.body: Same for child workflows (at least starting), external signals, nexus, and any other async thing a user should not be abandoning the response to. Things like timers make more sense to trivially abandon. An argument could be made for doing this for _all_ coroutines, but that may be a bit cumbersome for users doing background work (though there is precedent in language runtimes about unresolved promises or unawaited tasks and such).

title: Warn when activities dangle
